p: A total of 1,980 HFRS cases were reported in Molidawahaner during the study period, with an annual average incidence of 61.12 per 100,000. We also observed a peak of HFRS cases in winter. The monthly mean for LST and for rainfall were 1.3 Â°C and 39.4 mm, respectively. Figure 3 shows the temporal variation in climatic variables and the number of cases.
